content.query:
select*
    
from openrowset(
        BULK 'https://datalakestoragenithin.dfs.core.windows.net/restapi/user.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0A'
    ) with (
        doc nvarchar(max)
    ) as [result]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(doc)
